query: CREATE FUNCTION reverse_name(name) RETURNS name AS 'regresslib' LANGUAGE C STRICT
expected: CREATE FUNCTION reverse_name (name) RETURNS name AS $$regresslib$$ LANGUAGE c STRICT

query: UPDATE onek SET unique1 = onek.unique1 + 1
UPDATE onek SET unique1 = onek.unique1 - 1
SELECT two, stringu1, ten, string4 INTO TABLE tmp FROM onek
expected: SELECT two, stringu1, ten, string4 INTO tmp FROM onek

query: UPDATE tmp SET stringu1 = reverse_name(onek.stringu1) FROM onek WHERE onek.stringu1 = 'JBAAAA' and onek.stringu1 = tmp.stringu1
expected: UPDATE tmp SET stringu1 = reverse_name(onek.stringu1) FROM onek WHERE onek.stringu1 = 'JBAAAA' AND onek.stringu1 = tmp.stringu1

query: UPDATE tmp SET stringu1 = reverse_name(onek2.stringu1) FROM onek2 WHERE onek2.stringu1 = 'JCAAAA' and onek2.stringu1 = tmp.stringu1
expected: UPDATE tmp SET stringu1 = reverse_name(onek2.stringu1) FROM onek2 WHERE onek2.stringu1 = 'JCAAAA' AND onek2.stringu1 = tmp.stringu1

query: DROP TABLE tmp
CREATE TEMP TABLE onek_copy (LIKE onek)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE onek_copy (LIKE onek)

query: COPY onek_copy FROM 'filename'
SELECT * FROM onek EXCEPT ALL SELECT * FROM onek_copy
SELECT * FROM onek_copy EXCEPT ALL SELECT * FROM onek
CREATE TEMP TABLE stud_emp_copy (LIKE stud_emp)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE stud_emp_copy (LIKE stud_emp)

query: COPY BINARY stud_emp_copy FROM 'filename'
expected: COPY stud_emp_copy FROM 'filename' (format 'binary')

query: SELECT * FROM stud_emp_copy
CREATE TABLE hobbies_r ( name		text, person 		text )
expected: CREATE TABLE hobbies_r (name TEXT, person TEXT)

query: CREATE TABLE equipment_r ( name 		text, hobby		text )
expected: CREATE TABLE equipment_r (name TEXT, hobby TEXT)

query: INSERT INTO hobbies_r (name, person) SELECT 'posthacking', p.name FROM person* p WHERE p.name = 'mike' or p.name = 'jeff'
expected: INSERT INTO hobbies_r (name, person) (SELECT 'posthacking', p.name FROM person AS p WHERE p.name = 'mike' OR p.name = 'jeff')

query: INSERT INTO hobbies_r (name, person) SELECT 'basketball', p.name FROM person p WHERE p.name = 'joe' or p.name = 'sally'
expected: INSERT INTO hobbies_r (name, person) (SELECT 'basketball', p.name FROM person AS p WHERE p.name = 'joe' OR p.name = 'sally')

query: INSERT INTO hobbies_r (name) VALUES ('skywalking')
INSERT INTO equipment_r (name, hobby) VALUES ('advil', 'posthacking')
INSERT INTO equipment_r (name, hobby) VALUES ('peet''s coffee', 'posthacking')
INSERT INTO equipment_r (name, hobby) VALUES ('hightops', 'basketball')
INSERT INTO equipment_r (name, hobby) VALUES ('guts', 'skywalking')
CREATE FUNCTION hobbies(person) RETURNS setof hobbies_r AS 'select * from hobbies_r where person = $1.name' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION hobbies (person) RETURNS SETOF hobbies_r AS $$select * from hobbies_r where person = $1.name$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION hobby_construct(text, text) RETURNS hobbies_r AS 'select $1 as name, $2 as hobby' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION hobby_construct (TEXT, TEXT) RETURNS hobbies_r AS $$select $1 as name, $2 as hobby$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION hobby_construct_named(name text, hobby text) RETURNS hobbies_r AS 'select name, hobby' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION hobby_construct_named (name TEXT, hobby TEXT) RETURNS hobbies_r AS $$select name, hobby$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION hobbies_by_name(hobbies_r.name%TYPE) RETURNS hobbies_r.person%TYPE AS 'select person from hobbies_r where name = $1' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION hobbies_by_name (hobbies_r.name) RETURNS hobbies_r.person AS $$select person from hobbies_r where name = $1$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION equipment(hobbies_r) RETURNS setof equipment_r AS 'select * from equipment_r where hobby = $1.name' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION equipment (hobbies_r) RETURNS SETOF equipment_r AS $$select * from equipment_r where hobby = $1.name$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named(hobby hobbies_r) RETURNS setof equipment_r AS 'select * from equipment_r where equipment_r.hobby = equipment_named.hobby.name' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named (hobby hobbies_r) RETURNS SETOF equipment_r AS $$select * from equipment_r where equipment_r.hobby = equipment_named.hobby.name$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_1a(hobby hobbies_r) RETURNS setof equipment_r AS 'select * from equipment_r where hobby = equipment_named_ambiguous_1a.hobby.name' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_1a (hobby hobbies_r) RETURNS SETOF equipment_r AS $$select * from equipment_r where hobby = equipment_named_ambiguous_1a.hobby.name$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_1b(hobby hobbies_r) RETURNS setof equipment_r AS 'select * from equipment_r where equipment_r.hobby = hobby.name' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_1b (hobby hobbies_r) RETURNS SETOF equipment_r AS $$select * from equipment_r where equipment_r.hobby = hobby.name$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_1c(hobby hobbies_r) RETURNS setof equipment_r AS 'select * from equipment_r where hobby = hobby.name' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_1c (hobby hobbies_r) RETURNS SETOF equipment_r AS $$select * from equipment_r where hobby = hobby.name$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_2a(hobby text) RETURNS setof equipment_r AS 'select * from equipment_r where hobby = equipment_named_ambiguous_2a.hobby' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_2a (hobby TEXT) RETURNS SETOF equipment_r AS $$select * from equipment_r where hobby = equipment_named_ambiguous_2a.hobby$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_2b(hobby text) RETURNS setof equipment_r AS 'select * from equipment_r where equipment_r.hobby = hobby' LANGUAGE SQL
expected: CREATE FUNCTION equipment_named_ambiguous_2b (hobby TEXT) RETURNS SETOF equipment_r AS $$select * from equipment_r where equipment_r.hobby = hobby$$ LANGUAGE sql

query: SELECT p.name, name(p.hobbies) FROM ONLY person p
expected: SELECT p.name, name(p.hobbies) FROM ONLY person AS p

query: SELECT p.name, name(p.hobbies) FROM person* p
expected: SELECT p.name, name(p.hobbies) FROM person AS p

query: SELECT DISTINCT hobbies_r.name, name(hobbies_r.equipment) FROM hobbies_r ORDER BY 1,2
expected: SELECT DISTINCT hobbies_r.name, name(hobbies_r.equipment) FROM hobbies_r ORDER BY 1, 2

query: SELECT hobbies_r.name, (hobbies_r.equipment).name FROM hobbies_r
SELECT p.name, name(p.hobbies), name(equipment(p.hobbies)) FROM ONLY person p
expected: SELECT p.name, name(p.hobbies), name(equipment(p.hobbies)) FROM ONLY person AS p

query: SELECT p.name, name(p.hobbies), name(equipment(p.hobbies)) FROM person* p
expected: SELECT p.name, name(p.hobbies), name(equipment(p.hobbies)) FROM person AS p

query: SELECT name(equipment(p.hobbies)), p.name, name(p.hobbies) FROM ONLY person p
expected: SELECT name(equipment(p.hobbies)), p.name, name(p.hobbies) FROM ONLY person AS p

query: SELECT (p.hobbies).equipment.name, p.name, name(p.hobbies) FROM person* p
expected: SELECT (p.hobbies).equipment.name, p.name, name(p.hobbies) FROM person AS p

query: SELECT (p.hobbies).equipment.name, name(p.hobbies), p.name FROM ONLY person p
expected: SELECT (p.hobbies).equipment.name, name(p.hobbies), p.name FROM ONLY person AS p

query: SELECT name(equipment(p.hobbies)), name(p.hobbies), p.name FROM person* p
expected: SELECT name(equipment(p.hobbies)), name(p.hobbies), p.name FROM person AS p

query: SELECT name(equipment(hobby_construct(text 'skywalking', text 'mer')))
expected: SELECT name(equipment(hobby_construct(CAST('skywalking' AS TEXT), CAST('mer' AS TEXT))))

query: SELECT name(equipment(hobby_construct_named(text 'skywalking', text 'mer')))
expected: SELECT name(equipment(hobby_construct_named(CAST('skywalking' AS TEXT), CAST('mer' AS TEXT))))

query: SELECT name(equipment_named(hobby_construct_named(text 'skywalking', text 'mer')))
expected: SELECT name(equipment_named(hobby_construct_named(CAST('skywalking' AS TEXT), CAST('mer' AS TEXT))))

query: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_1a(hobby_construct_named(text 'skywalking', text 'mer')))
expected: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_1a(hobby_construct_named(CAST('skywalking' AS TEXT), CAST('mer' AS TEXT))))

query: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_1b(hobby_construct_named(text 'skywalking', text 'mer')))
expected: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_1b(hobby_construct_named(CAST('skywalking' AS TEXT), CAST('mer' AS TEXT))))

query: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_1c(hobby_construct_named(text 'skywalking', text 'mer')))
expected: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_1c(hobby_construct_named(CAST('skywalking' AS TEXT), CAST('mer' AS TEXT))))

query: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_2a(text 'skywalking'))
expected: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_2a(CAST('skywalking' AS TEXT)))

query: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_2b(text 'skywalking'))
expected: SELECT name(equipment_named_ambiguous_2b(CAST('skywalking' AS TEXT)))

query: SELECT hobbies_by_name('basketball')
SELECT name, overpaid(emp.*) FROM emp
SELECT * FROM equipment(ROW('skywalking', 'mer'))
SELECT name(equipment(ROW('skywalking', 'mer')))
SELECT *, name(equipment(h.*)) FROM hobbies_r h
expected: SELECT *, name(equipment(h.*)) FROM hobbies_r AS h

query: SELECT *, (equipment(CAST((h.*) AS hobbies_r))).name FROM hobbies_r h
expected: SELECT *, (equipment(CAST((h.*) AS hobbies_r))).name FROM hobbies_r AS h
